dataList.name: 信息传递
dataList.desc: 使仪表盘上位置位于自身之后的2名友方获得1层强袭 。

dataList.name: 观察
dataList.desc: 进行拼点时，使对方的拼点威力减少(暴食共鸣数/4)点。

dataList.name: 冷静
dataList.desc: 拼点胜利时，使自身获得1层呼吸法 。

dataList.name: 分析
dataList.desc: 攻击带有减益效果的目标时，使自身造成的伤害+10%。

dataList.name: 自行充能
dataList.desc: 攻击命中时，使自身获得1层充能 。

dataList.name: 决心
dataList.desc: 下回合开始时，若自身的呼吸法 层数不低于4层，则使自身获得2层迅捷 。

dataList.name: 正义裁决
dataList.desc: 技能拼点胜利时，使自身造成的伤害增加10%。

dataList.name: 快速充能
dataList.desc: 战斗开始时，使自身获得(忧郁共鸣数/3)层充能 。

dataList.name: 心理准备
dataList.desc: 下回合使自身获得(愤怒共鸣数/3)层迅捷 。

dataList.name: 万般皆艺
dataList.desc: 使自身造成与受到的伤害都增加25%。

dataList.name: 刀.断.
dataList.desc: 本回合使自身的内斩击伤害+(暴食共鸣数/2)%。

dataList.name: 黑云道
dataList.desc: 使自身对带有流血 的目标造成的伤害+(色欲共鸣数)%。

dataList.name: 决心
dataList.desc: 若自身的体力低于50%，则在战斗开始时使自身获得1层守护 。

dataList.name: Great Mountain
dataList.desc:
受到攻击时，使对方增加1级烧伤 强度。
单个回合最多生效(色欲共鸣数/2)次。

dataList.name: Enduring Spirit
dataList.desc:
受到攻击时，使自身获得1层充能 。
单个回合最多生效(嫉妒共鸣数/2)次。

dataList.name: Entertainment
dataList.desc: 下回合开始时，使自身恢复6点理智值。

dataList.name: 黑云道
dataList.desc: 使位于连锁末尾的技能中最后一个硬币会令目标增加(色欲共鸣数/3)级流血 强度。

dataList.name: Gaiety
dataList.desc: 下回合开始时，使自身恢复(暴食共鸣数x2)点理智值。

dataList.name: Ressentiment
dataList.desc: 若目标的体力上限高于自身，则使自身对其造成的伤害+10%。

dataList.name: Respiration
dataList.desc: 受到伤害后，本回合内使自身造成的伤害+(暴怒共鸣数x2)%。

dataList.name: Raring to Graze
dataList.desc:
下回合使自身获得(暴怒共鸣数)层充能 。
若自身的充能 层数高于5层，则使自身获得1层迅捷 和1层强壮 。

dataList.name: Last-ditch Struggle
dataList.desc: 若自身的体力低于25%，则使自身的拼点威力+1。

dataList.name: Brainwave Focus
dataList.desc:
战斗开始时，使自身失去15点理智值。
下回合使自身获得(暴食共鸣数/3)层强壮 。

dataList.name: Walking the Line of Death
dataList.desc: 自身的体力低于50%时，通过技能增加的呼吸法 强度额外+1级。

dataList.name: Eye for Weakness
dataList.desc: 自身在拼点胜利后，攻击会使目标增加1级震颤 强度。

dataList.name: Split Evil
dataList.desc: 使自身的攻击在命中时，有(暴怒共鸣x10)%的概率使目标增加1级流血 强度。

dataList.name: 黑云道
dataList.desc: 自身的呼吸法 强度高于5级时，反击技能改为使用3技能进行反击。

dataList.name: Breach Defense
dataList.desc: 对本回合使用了守备技能的目标造成的伤害+(嫉妒共鸣数)%。

dataList.name: 决心
dataList.desc: 友方被击杀时，下回合使自身获得1层强壮 。

dataList.name: Slayer
dataList.desc: The last Coin on the last skill in the chain deals +(2x Pride Res.)% damage.

dataList.name: Your Shield
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, apply 2 Defense Power Up and 1 Protection to allies adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard.

dataList.name: Júbilo Hedonista
dataList.desc: After a successful evade, lower Stagger Threshold by the evade skill’s Power at a (5x Gloom Res.)% chance.

dataList.name: Executor
dataList.desc: If target’s SP is below 0, deal +10% damage.

dataList.name: Levelheaded
dataList.desc: Deal +(2x Pride Res.)% damage to enemies with less than 25% HP.

dataList.name: Morale Boost
dataList.desc: Next turn, apply 2 Haste to self and allies who are adjacent to this unit on the Dashboard this turn.

dataList.name: Forced Survival
dataList.desc: Heal 5 HP at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Ignition
dataList.desc: The 3rd and subsequent Coins of a skill inflict (Sloth Res. / 3) Burn on hit.

dataList.name: Emergency Rations
dataList.desc: At less than 25% HP, heal (Gluttony Res. / 3)% HP on clash win.

dataList.name: 信息汇总
dataList.desc: 回合结束时，若理智值最低的友方在本回合失去了理智值，则使其恢复10点理智值。

dataList.name: 分析
dataList.desc: 使体力上限最高的1名友方拼点威力+1。

dataList.name: 指点
dataList.desc: 使理智值最高的1名友方通过技能获得的呼吸法 层数额外+1层。

dataList.name: 观察
dataList.desc: 使体力上限最高的1名友方的攻击命中时有25%的概率对目标施加1层钝挫 。

dataList.name: 无线通讯
dataList.desc: 使体力上限最低的1名友方获得1层充能 。

dataList.name: 援护
dataList.desc: 使体力上限最低的1名友方守备技能最终威力+2。

dataList.name: 呐喊助威
dataList.desc: 使理智值最高的1名友方造成的突刺伤害+10%。

dataList.name: 万念俱灰
dataList.desc: 使速度值最高的1名友方本回合使用的首个技能最终威力+1。

dataList.name: 一分为二
dataList.desc: 使速度值最高的1名友方造成的斩击伤害+10%。

dataList.name: 急不可待
dataList.desc: 使体力上限最低的1名友方造成与受到的伤害都增加20%。

dataList.name: 破局者
dataList.desc: 使体力上限最低的1名友方令目标增加的破裂 强度额外+1级。

dataList.name: 行动组长
dataList.desc: 使速度值最高的1名友方令目标增加的流血 强度额外+1级。

dataList.desc: Give a random ally the following effect: When hit by an attack this turn, heal 3 HP at a 50% chance.

dataList.desc: Give a random ally the following effect: Deal +2 damage after winning a clash.

dataList.desc: Give a random ally the following effect: When hit by an attack this turn, deal 1 damage to the attacker at a 25% chance.

dataList.name: Obsessive Hammer
dataList.desc: When below 50% HP, remove 1 negative status effect and gain 1 Fanatic, 1 Attack Power Up, and 3 Protection at the start of the combat phase.

dataList.name: Joy of Execution
dataList.desc:
After an enemy is defeated, gain 1 Haste and 1 Damage Up next turn.
If this unit defeated an enemy, also gain 1 Fanatic. (Once per turn.)

dataList.name: Highest Honor
dataList.desc:
Apply 1 Attack Power Up and 1 Protection to the ally with the lowest HP.
If the ally is from N Corp, also apply 1 Fanatic.

dataList.name: Rising Faith
dataList.desc: After an enemy is defeated, apply 1 Haste and 1 Damage Up to the ally with the highest SP. (Once per turn.)

dataList.name: 哨声
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, heal 2 allies with the lowest SP for 15 SP. If the ally is from N Corp, also apply 1 Fanatic.

dataList.name: 低语
dataList.desc: At the start of the combat phase, heal the ally with the lowest SP for 15 SP. If the ally is from N Corp, also apply 1 Fanatic.

dataList.name: Bugger…
dataList.desc: When an ally is defeated, lose 10 SP and gain 1 Blunt Power Up next turn.
